blogtitle: tech never ending changes, always improving
blogdetails: in this world of connectivity, technology is every evolving. I can remember when computers were so big and now they are as small as a watch.

blogtitle: tech giants love to take over the rest
blogdetails: companies in tech just continue to grow and grow and bulldoze over the little guys fortunately there is always a chance for the smaller companies to retire larger ones.

blogdetai: websites have evolved so much over the years
